comment:
Extracted Variables:
- x: number of bottles of alpha brand drink
- y: number of bottles of omega brand drink

Extracted Constraints:
1. Protein constraint: 30x + 20y \geq 100 (at least 100 grams of protein)
2. Calorie constraint: 350x + 300y \geq 2000 (at least 2000 calories)
3. Omega brand constraint: y \leq 0.35(x + y) (at most 35% of the drink should be omega brand)

Objective Function:
Minimize 20x + 15y (sugar intake)
